snippet: Mrs. Clinton doesn’t mention the policy that economists widely see as the most effective way to tackle warming — and one that would need Congress’s assent....
abstract: Hillary Clinton promises to exceed Pres Obama's climate change goals with multibillion-dollar effort to produce third of nation's electricity from renewable sources by 2027; asserts plan can be implemented without action by Congress; proposals exclude mention of tax on carbon emissions, policy that experts say is necessary to achieving her target but is one Republican lawmakers vehemently oppose.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton doesn’t mention the policy that economists widely see as the most effective way to tackle warming — and one that would need Congress’s assent.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Ambitious Climate Change Plan Avoids Carbon Tax
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Climate Change Plan  Avoids Mention of Carbon Tax

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
